trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el método <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> provides all the information needed for a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to paint within an area based on the value of the specified object, including the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> in which the drawing should be done and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object with which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> proporciona toda la información necesaria para un <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> para pintar dentro de un área en función del valor del objeto especificado, incluido el <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> en que debe realizarse el dibujo y la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> del objeto con el que debe realizarse el dibujo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> that provides the data needed to paint a representation of the value of an object within a given area:
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código de ejemplo método devuelve un <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> que proporciona los datos necesarios para pintar una representación del valor de un objeto dentro de un área determinado:

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener acceso completo a los recursos del sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valores de petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estado asociado:

trans-unit.source: The context in which the value appears.
trans-unit.target: Contexto en el que aparece el valor.

trans-unit.source: The value to paint.
trans-unit.target: Valor que se va a dibujar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object with which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> con el que va a realizarse el dibujo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> en el que va a realizarse el dibujo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> class using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> mediante los valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el rectángulo que indica la zona en la que se debe dibujar.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: El rectángulo que indica la zona en la que se debe dibujar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> interface to be used to gain additional information about the context this value appears in.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que se va a utilizar para obtener información adicional sobre el contexto en el que aparece el valor.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that indicates the context of the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que indica el contexto del evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object with which painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> con el que se debe dibujar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que se utiliza para dibujar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor que se va a dibujar.

trans-unit.source: An object indicating what to paint.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que indica lo que se va a dibujar.
